item.title: Defining a User's Home Community
item.description: The notion of a ‘home’ community seems pretty unique to Reddit, since it has self-contained subreddits. Sure, you can triangulate as user’s home on FB and Twitter, but you wouldn’t be able to anchor it to anything singular1, which is key to the idea of ‘home’.
